BasicAttackLoadUpAndRollOut.name: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out

desc.1: Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

DashAttackPedalToTheMetal.name: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold <IconSpecial /> to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill up to 2 times.
desc.3: If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, you can quickly activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct> of an increased charge level.
desc.4: During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct> is active, release <IconSpecial /> to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct>, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.1: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, continue holding <IconSpecialReady /> after <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct> reaches maximum charge level to activate:
desc.1: Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her and dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s.
desc.3: During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: During <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</ct>, release <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If the duration of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</ct> reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</ct> will automatically activate.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, followed by a downward smash, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</ct> when the character is under intense attacks.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Piper has 20 or more stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Power</ct>, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%.

1.name: Leisure Moment
1.desc: When Piper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Power</ct>. The maximum stack limit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Power</ct> is increased to 30.

flavor.0: One ordinary morning at Sons of Calydon, Piper lets out a lazy yawn.
flavor.2: "Can we have another relaxing day today? It's important to take it easy, or else lil ol' me might end up working meself to death—"

2.name: Motivation
2.desc: During <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</ct>, Piper's movement speed increases. When using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: One Trillion Tons</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Power</ct>, this buff is further increased by 1%.

flavor.0: A bit of effort now means more rest later.
flavor.1: Though, it'd be even better if I didn't have to put in any effort at all — Piper stretches, pats the soft bed in her truck, and lies down.

3.name: Truck Expert
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Piper is always all about trucks.
flavor.1: Even when she's fast asleep, the rumble of an engine snaps her awake in an instant:
flavor.2: "100 horsepower, 5-ton capacity... must be the new light truck from Three Gates Industries!"

4.name: Refined Techniques
4.desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.

flavor.0: Riding with Piper is a heart-pounding experience.
flavor.1: By the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
flavor.2: She always gets you to your destination fast—though your nerves might take a hit.

5.name: Personal Hobbies
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Piper seems to have some hobbies that are not what you'd expect from her.
flavor.1: "This horse looks like a real runner... Hmm, but not many people are betting on it. Guess the one with the higher win rate is the safer bet..."
flavor.2: "Burp— Nitro-Fuel... I can drink more... Gimme another one!"

6.name: Mild Excitement
6.desc: Increases the duration limit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</ct> by 2s and extends the duration of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Power</ct> by 4s.

flavor.0: As you may already know, Piper's biggest dream is to live a life of perpetual relaxation.
flavor.1: But right now, her usually half-closed eyes are surprisingly bright and alert.
flavor.2: "If it's for you... I suppose lil ol' me can try a little harder~"
